title: The Remedy Pharm
description: An eco-friendly 8,000-square foot store built with mostly organic materials. Stocks homeopathic remedies, organic and green cleaning supplies, animal safe organic make-up, trendy recycled products like purses and bags, nutritional supplement products, full line of mommy and baby care products, essential oils, aromatherapy, personal care, packaged snack foods, and more. No fresh produce. Has an onsite compounding pharmacy and hosts yoga fitness classes and other events.
